segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes while the sink overflows, and it’s just disgusting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is all over the floor, and she’s just standing in it like it’s normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the puddle spreading, and it’s making me feel sick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and the whole scene is just a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the kitchen is going to be ruined if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that wobbly stool, and it’s just gross how unsafe it is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like the whole place is falling apart, and no one cares.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and it’s making me want to leave.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so oblivious, and it’s just disgusting to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand how dirty and chaotic everything is.
segments.speaker: PAR
